collector:ActOfAggression.NAME: Act of Aggression
collector:ActOfAggression.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 给予所有敌人 !M! 层 易伤 。

collector:AlwaysMore.NAME: 多多益善Always More
collector:AlwaysMore.DESCRIPTION: collector:焰葬 。 NL 获得 !M! 金币 。

collector:Arrogance.NAME: Arrogance
collector:Arrogance.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 本回合下张攻击会给予 !M! 层 collector:魂陷 。

collector:AshesAndDust.NAME: Ashes and Dust
collector:AshesAndDust.DESCRIPTION: 对所有敌人造成 !D! 点伤害X次。 NL 若X大于4， NL 再造成2次。

collector:BindingCall.NAME: Binding Call
collector:BindingCall.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 层 临时生命 。 NL 临时生命 耗尽时， 给予所有敌人 !clm2! 层 collector:魂陷 。

collector:Billow.NAME: Billow
collector:Billow.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 下回合， NL 获得一张 *Bellow 。

collector:Bellow.NAME: Bellow
collector:Bellow.DESCRIPTION: 给予你上回合余下的 格挡 层 collector:魂陷 。

collector:BlackBindings.NAME: Black Bindings
collector:BlackBindings.DESCRIPTION: 给予 !M! 层 虚弱 。 NL 给予 !clm2! 层 collector:魂陷 。

collector:Bonfire.NAME: 篝火Bonfire
collector:Bonfire.DESCRIPTION: collector:焰葬 。 NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 下回合， NL 获得1 collector:储能 。

collector:BrainDrain.NAME: 意识窥视Brain Drain
collector:BrainDrain.DESCRIPTION: 获得目标的 藏品 牌， NL 本回合其单次耗能为0。 NL 消耗 。

collector:BramblesparKindling.NAME: Bramblespar Kindling
collector:BramblesparKindling.DESCRIPTION: 不能被打出 。 NL 本牌被 消耗 时， NL 获得一张打击+ !M! 。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须点燃这份燃材才能发挥它的作用。

collector:CantTouchThis.NAME: ?不能触Can't Touch This
collector:CantTouchThis.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 点 敏捷 。 NL 防住攻击时， NL 给予对方 !clm2! 层 collector:魂陷 。

collector:CoffinNail.NAME: 棺材钉Coffin Nail
collector:CoffinNail.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 本牌被 消耗 时， NL 下回合返回手牌， NL 且伤害加 !M! 。

collector:CursedWail.NAME: Cursed Wail
collector:CursedWail.DESCRIPTION: 被 collector:折磨 的敌人失去1点 力量 。 NL 所有敌人本回合失去 !M! 层 力量 。 NL 消耗 。

collector:DarkApotheosis.NAME: 黑化Dark Apotheosis
collector:DarkApotheosis.DESCRIPTION: 升级 *收藏堆 的牌。 NL 消耗 。

collector:DarkLordForm.NAME: 暗主形态
collector:DarkLordForm.DESCRIPTION: 虚无 。 NL 藏品牌额外打出一次。

collector:DarkwoodKindling.NAME: Darkwood Kindling
collector:DarkwoodKindling.DESCRIPTION: 不能被打出 。 NL 本牌被 消耗 时， NL 所有敌人失去 !M! 点生命。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须点燃这份燃材才能发挥它的作用。

collector:DoubleTrouble.NAME: 祸不单行Double Trouble
collector:DoubleTrouble.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 本回合下张 collector:藏品 牌额外打出一次。

collector:DragonsTrove.NAME: 龙之私藏Dragon's Trove
collector:DragonsTrove.DESCRIPTION: 抽3张 collector:藏品 牌。 NL 获得 !M! collector:储能 。 NL 消耗 。

collector:Ember.NAME: 余烬Ember
collector:Ember.DESCRIPTION: 不能被打出 。 NL 保留 。 NL 本牌被 消耗 时， NL 获得 !M! 点 力量 。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: These embers must be lit, not played。

collector:Empower.NAME: Empower
collector:Empower.DESCRIPTION: 接下来 !M! 个回合， NL 获得X点 力量 。

collector:Extricate.NAME: Extricate
collector:Extricate.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 若目标被 collector:折磨 中， NL 打出抽牌堆顶部的牌。

collector:FeelMyPain.NAME: 替受疼痛Feel My Pain
collector:FeelMyPain.DESCRIPTION: 消耗 一张牌时， NL 随机敌人失去 !M! 点生命。

collector:FiendFire.NAME: Fiend Fire
collector:FiendFire.DESCRIPTION: 消耗 所有手牌， NL 每张造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 消耗 。

collector:Finalize.NAME: Finalize
collector:Finalize.DESCRIPTION: 给予 !M! 层 collector:魂陷 。 NL 若目标本回合死亡， NL 回复 !clm2! 点生命。

collector:FingerOfDeath.NAME: Finger of Death
collector:FingerOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: 只能使用 collector:储能 打出。 NL 给予 !M! 层 collector:魂陷 。

collector:FlameLash.NAME: Flame Lash
collector:FlameLash.DESCRIPTION: collector:焰葬 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 获得所 消耗 牌的伤害。

collector:Forgery.NAME: 伪造Forgery
collector:Forgery.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 从 *收藏堆 !M! 张随机牌中选择获得一张。

collector:FuelTheFire.NAME: Fuel the Fire
collector:FuelTheFire.DESCRIPTION: collector:焰葬 。 NL 下回合， NL 获得 !M! collector:储能 。

collector:Goodbye.NAME: Goodbye
collector:Goodbye.DESCRIPTION: 翻倍目标的 collector:魂陷 。 NL 消耗 。
collector:Goodbye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 三倍目标的 collector:魂陷 。 NL 消耗 。

collector:GreenGaze.NAME: Green Gaze
collector:GreenGaze.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If you played a collector:藏品 card this turn, 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。

collector:Heatwave.NAME: 热波Heat Wave
collector:Heatwave.DESCRIPTION: 对被 collector:折磨 的敌人造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 获得一张 *余烬 。

collector:Hoard.NAME: 囤积Hoard
collector:Hoard.DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张牌。 NL 将其保留至下回合， NL 但本回合无法打出。

collector:HoardersStrike.NAME: Hoarder's Strike
collector:HoardersStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 打出 *收藏堆 顶部的牌。

collector:Hurting.NAME: Hurting
collector:Hurting.DESCRIPTION: 保留 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL When Retained, increase its cost by 1 and damage by !M! this combat。

collector:IllTakeThat.NAME: I'll Take That
collector:IllTakeThat.DESCRIPTION: Steal up to !M! of the enemy's Block. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。

collector:InflictAgony.NAME: Inflict Agony
collector:InflictAgony.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 若目标 not collector:折磨, 给予 2 Weak and Vulnerable。

collector:Invigorate.NAME: Invigorate
collector:Invigorate.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Vigor. NL 下回合， 获得 !M! Vigor。

collector:LanternFlare.NAME: Lantern Flare
collector:LanternFlare.DESCRIPTION: collector:焰葬 。 NL Deal !D! damage and 给予 !M! collector:魂陷 to a random enemy。

collector:MastersCall.NAME: Master's Call
collector:MastersCall.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Temporary_点生命。 NL Whenever you play an Attack, if you have Temporary_HP, deal !clm2! damage to a random enemy。

collector:MiniCurse.NAME: Mini-Curse
collector:MiniCurse.DESCRIPTION: collector:焰葬 。 NL 给予 1 Weak and Vulnerable。
collector:MiniCurse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: collector:焰葬 。 NL 给予 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies。

collector:Misdirect.NAME: Misdirect
collector:Misdirect.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 下回合， 获得 1 collector:储能 。

collector:MysteryWeaving.NAME: Mystery Weaving
collector:MysteryWeaving.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Grants 2 less Block for each other card in your hand。

collector:OakbrimKindling.NAME: Oakbrim Kindling
collector:OakbrimKindling.DESCRIPTION: 不能被打出 。 NL 本牌被 消耗 时， draw !M! 牌。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须点燃这份燃材才能发挥它的作用。

collector:Omen.NAME: Omen
collector:Omen.DESCRIPTION: Attacking an collector:折磨 enemy consumes 1 Weak and Vulnerable. When it does, they lose !M! 点生命。

collector:ProtectingCall.NAME: Protecting Call
collector:ProtectingCall.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Temporary_点生命。 At the start of your turn, if you have Temporary_HP, 获得 !clm2! Block。

collector:Pyromancy.NAME: Pyromancy
collector:Pyromancy.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, 获得 1 collector:储能 。
collector:Pyromancy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, 获得 1 collector:储能 。

collector:RagingCall.NAME: Raging Call
collector:RagingCall.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Temporary_点生命。 NL At the end of your turn, if you have Temporary_HP, deal !clm2! damage to ALL enemies。

collector:ReceiveTribute.NAME: Receive Tribute
collector:ReceiveTribute.DESCRIPTION: collector:焰葬 。 NL Choose 1 of !M! Boss cards and add it into your hand. It 获得s 保留 。 NL 消耗 。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand。

collector:Roast.NAME: Roast
collector:Roast.DESCRIPTION: collector:焰葬 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。

collector:RotwoodKindling.NAME: Rotwood Kindling
collector:RotwoodKindling.DESCRIPTION: 不能被打出 。 NL 本牌被 消耗 时， 给予 !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须点燃这份燃材才能发挥它的作用。

collector:SapStrength.NAME: Sap Strength
collector:SapStrength.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If the enemy has Strength, steal up to 2 Strength。

collector:ScorchingRay.NAME: Scorching Ray
collector:ScorchingRay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times。

collector:SeedOfDoubt.NAME: Seed of Doubt
collector:SeedOfDoubt.DESCRIPTION: 给予 !M! 层 collector:魂陷 。 NL Whenever a card is Exhausted, if this is in your hand, increase its collector:魂陷 by !clm2!。

collector:ShadowDaggers.NAME: Shadow Daggers
collector:ShadowDaggers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each collector:藏品 card played this combat. NL 消耗 。

collector:SomberShield.NAME: Somber Shield
collector:SomberShield.DESCRIPTION: collector:焰葬 。 NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 下回合， 获得 a copy of the exhausted card。

collector:SoulSnare.NAME: Soul Snare
collector:SoulSnare.DESCRIPTION: 给予 !M! 层 collector:魂陷 。 NL 消耗 。

collector:SparkStrike.NAME: Spark Strike
collector:SparkStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Add 1 *Ember into your hand。

collector:SpiritLeech.NAME: Spirit Leech
collector:SpiritLeech.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 若目标 collector:折磨, draw !M! 牌。

collector:StashAway.NAME: Stash Away
collector:StashAway.DESCRIPTION: 获得 1 collector:储能 。 NL Double your collector:储能 。 NL 消耗 。

collector:SuckerPunch.NAME: Sucker Punch
collector:SuckerPunch.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 给予 !M! 层 虚弱 。

collector:Suffering.NAME: Suffering
collector:Suffering.DESCRIPTION: When you 给予 Weak or Vulnerable to an enemy, also 给予 !M! collector:魂陷 to them。

collector:SunbloomKindling.NAME: Sunbloom Kindling
collector:SunbloomKindling.DESCRIPTION: 不能被打出 。 NL 本牌被 消耗 时， 获得 !M! 点 力量 and add 2 *Embers into your hand。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 我必须点燃这份燃材才能发挥它的作用。

collector:ThornWhip.NAME: Thorn Whip
collector:ThornWhip.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 若目标 collector:折磨, repeat this twice。
collector:ThornWhip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 保留 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 若目标 collector:折磨, repeat this twice。

collector:Torchbearer.NAME: Torchbearer
collector:Torchbearer.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Temporary_点生命。 NL 消耗 。

collector:WhirlingFlame.NAME: Whirling Flame
collector:WhirlingFlame.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile。

collector:Wildfire.NAME: Wildfire
collector:Wildfire.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Exhaust all Unplayable cards in your hand and 获得 !B! Block for each。

collector:YouAreMine.NAME: You Are Mine!
collector:YouAreMine.DESCRIPTION: 给予 !M! 层 虚弱 。 NL 给予 !M! Vulnerable. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL 给予 !clm2! 层 collector:魂陷 。 NL 消耗 。

collector:Whomp.NAME: Whomp
collector:Whomp.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 获得 !M! Temporary_点生命。 NL 消耗 。

collector:LouseCard.NAME: Louse
collector:LouseCard.DESCRIPTION: The next time you receive unblocked attack damage, 获得 !B! Block and 1 Blur。

collector:AcidSlimeCard.NAME: Acid Slime
collector:AcidSlimeCard.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. NL Add a copy of it into your hand。

collector:AugmenterCard.NAME: Augmenter
collector:AugmenterCard.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 点生命。 NL 获得 !M! 点 力量 。

collector:BearCard.NAME: Bear
collector:BearCard.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Remove the enemy's Block. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。

collector:BlueSlaverCard.NAME: Blue Slaver
collector:BlueSlaverCard.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 给予 1 Weak. NL Double the enemy's Weak。

collector:BookOfStabbingCard.NAME: Book of Stabbing
collector:BookOfStabbingCard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, 给予 !M! 层 collector:魂陷 。

collector:BronzeOrbCard.NAME: Bronze Orb
collector:BronzeOrbCard.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL The top card of your draw pile costs 0 until played。

collector:CenturionCard.NAME: Centurion
collector:CenturionCard.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 获得 !M! 点 敏捷 。

collector:ChosenCard.NAME: Chosen
collector:ChosenCard.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy does not intend to attack, 给予 !M! Weak and Vulnerable。

collector:CultistCard.NAME: Cultist
collector:CultistCard.DESCRIPTION: collector:焰葬 。 NL 获得 1 Ritual。

collector:DaggerCard.NAME: Dagger
collector:DaggerCard.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! 点生命. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。

collector:DarklingsCard.NAME: Darklings
collector:DarklingsCard.DESCRIPTION: Your next 2 cards this turn are played twice。

collector:FaceTraderCard.NAME: Face Trader
collector:FaceTraderCard.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random cards of any color into your hand. NL They become 虚无 。

collector:FatGremlinCard.NAME: Fat Gremlin
collector:FatGremlinCard.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 给予 !M! 层 虚弱 。

collector:FungiBeastCard.NAME: Fungi Beast
collector:FungiBeastCard.DESCRIPTION: 给予 !M! Vulnerable. NL 给予 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies。

collector:GremlinLeaderCard.NAME: Gremlin Leader
collector:GremlinLeaderCard.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Gremlin Collectibles into your hand。

collector:GremlinNobCard.NAME: Gremlin Nob
collector:GremlinNobCard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Skill, 获得 1 Strength。

collector:GremlinWizardCard.NAME: Gremlin Wizard
collector:GremlinWizardCard.DESCRIPTION: 下回合， NL 获得 !M! Vigor。

collector:JawWormCard.NAME: Jaw Worm
collector:JawWormCard.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 获得 !M! 点 力量 。

collector:LivingWallCard.NAME: Living Wall
collector:LivingWallCard.DESCRIPTION: collector:焰葬 。 NL 获得 a random Upgraded card. NL It costs 0 until played。

collector:MadGremlinCard.NAME: Mad Gremlin
collector:MadGremlinCard.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Temporary Strength. NL If you receive unblocked attack damage this turn, add a copy of this into your hand。

collector:MerchantCard.NAME: Merchant
collector:MerchantCard.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Colorless cards into your hand. NL They cost 0 this turn。

collector:MushroomCard.NAME: Mushroom
collector:MushroomCard.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 给予 !M! Weak or Vulnerable at random。

collector:NemesisCard.NAME: Nemesis
collector:NemesisCard.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, 获得 1 Intangible。

collector:OrbWalkerCard.NAME: Orb Walker
collector:OrbWalkerCard.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Add !M! *Embers into your hand。

collector:PointyCard.NAME: Pointy
collector:PointyCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Draw 1 card。

collector:ReptomancerCard.NAME: Reptomancer
collector:ReptomancerCard.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Temporary_点生命。 NL At the end of your turn, if you have Temporary_HP, 给予 !clm2! Poison to a random enemy。

collector:RomeoCard.NAME: Romeo
collector:RomeoCard.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack this turn costs 0 and deals !M! additional damage。

collector:SentryCard.NAME: Sentry
collector:SentryCard.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 给予 !M! Weak to ALL enemies。

collector:SneakyGremlinCard.NAME: Sneaky Gremlin
collector:SneakyGremlinCard.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Draw 1 card。

collector:SneckoCard.NAME: Snecko

collector:SphericGuardianCard.NAME: Spheric Guardian
collector:SphericGuardianCard.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your turn。

collector:SpikeSlimeCard.NAME: Spike Slime
collector:SpikeSlimeCard.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Add 1 *Slimed into your discard pile。

collector:TaskmasterCard.NAME: Taskmaster
collector:TaskmasterCard.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 获得 !M! 点 力量 . NL 给予 !clm2! 层 collector:魂陷 。

collector:ThievesCard.NAME: Thieves
collector:ThievesCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less damage for the next !M! turns。

collector:TorchHeadCard.NAME: Torch Head
collector:TorchHeadCard.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Torchhead Call into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn。

collector:TransientCard.NAME: Transient
collector:TransientCard.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 点 力量 . NL Die in 6 turns。

collector:WrithingMassCard.NAME: Writhing Mass
collector:WrithingMassCard.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Play the top card of your draw pile。

collector:DefaultCollectibleCard.NAME: Default Collectible
collector:DefaultCollectibleCard.DESCRIPTION: This foe doesn't have a unique Collectible yet! NL 获得 !M! 点 力量 and Dexterity。
